title: Win-Win♪
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Your channel is amazing, Karin-chan. You’re teaching some really advanced stretching.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Thank you. I have confidence in that kind of stuff, so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Is it okay if I ask you to teach me about the one that you did on stream the other day in detail? I would like to know if you have a routine or something like that, Karin-chan....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, of course it’s okay. But, it doesn’t seem fair to me if only I tell you about my secrets....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>You do tarot readings on your channel, right, Nozomi-chan? Would you also read my fortune?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Oh, just that? I was so nervous about what kind of conditions you would ask for~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Geez, just what kind of person do you take me for? Well, that’s fine, I guess that’s a deal.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>It’s a win-win!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Then, I’ll teach you thoroughly~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
